  <h1>The Ceedling Plugin</h1>

<h1>Ceedling Plugin for Sublime Text Editor</h1>

<h2>Ceedling - Ruby/Rake-Based Build System for C Projects</h2>
<p>Ceedling is a build system for C projects that is an extension for Ruby's Rake (make-ish) build system. Ceedling is primarily targeted at Test-Driven Development in C and is designed to pull together CMock and Unity, two other awesome open-source projects that you can't live without if you are doing TDD in the C language. In order to spread the awesomeness around, Ceedling is an extensible contraption with a nice plugin mechanism.
</p>

<h2>Release Notes</h2>
<p>v0.1 - Initial plugin population
</p>
  
<h2>To Install This Plugin</h2>

<ol>
<li>download the <a href="http://www.sublimetextwiki.com/sublime-packages/Ceedling.sublime-package ">Ceedling Plugin</a> to your local hard-drive.</li>
 <li>double-click the package file</li>
 <li>restart Sublime Text</li>
</ol>

<h2>For Developers</h2>

<ul>
<li>This source code for this plugin is available at <a href="http://sublime-text-community-packages.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Ceedling">google code.</a></li>
 <li>Google provide <a href="http://code.google.com/p/sublime-text-community-packages/source/checkout">Instructions for checking out the code</a></li>
</ul>
